html: (1 Nephi 21:16)."I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands." The marks of the crucifying nails in His palms could be a messianic meaning of this phrase. (Zechariah 13:6; 3 Nephi 11:14.) This could also have reference to the ancient custom of tattooing sacred images or symbols on one's palms as a constant reminder of that to which one was devoted. In Isaiah's imagery, the Lord could not use His hands without being reminded of Israel.
